          <title>
            <string language="en">Uranium radioactive decay</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Uranium radioaktiver Zerfall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaiblissement radioactif en uranium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deterioração radioativa de urânio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Deperimento radioattivo uranium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιενεργός αποσύνθεση ουράνιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Decaimiento radiactivo de uranio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the radioactive decay of uranium-238, splitting into an alpha particle and a thorium atom.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alpha particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nucleon number</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">proton number</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radiations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactive decays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radionuclides</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thorium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">uranium</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht den radioaktiven 
Zerfall von uranium-238 und spaltet in ein Alphateilchen und in ein 
Thoriumatom auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre l'affaiblissement 
radioactif d'uranium-238, coupant en particule d'alpha et atome de 
thorium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a deterioração radioativa
de uranium-238, rachando em uma partícula de alfa e em um átomo do 
thorium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra il deperimento radioattivo
di uranium-238, dividendo in particella di alfa ed atomo del torio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τη ραδιενεργό αποσύνθεση 
ουράνιο- 238, χωρίζοντας σε ένα άλφα μόριο και ένα άτομο 
θορίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra el decaimiento radiactivo 
de uranium-238, partiendo en una partícula alfa y un átomo del 
torio.</string>
          </description>
